belongs_to_collection.name: Prometheus: The Peter Weyland Files Collection

overview: Created exclusively for the home video release of Prometheus, the film takes the form of a "greeting" transmission prepared for the Prometheus mission, designed to be transmitted ahead of the ship's arrival at LV-223 in order to prepare any potential alien life forms inhabiting the moon for first contact with the ship's human crew.
title: The Peter Weyland Files: 'Prometheus' Transmission
